channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Grâce à Amazon, la tablette Honor Pad X9a avec écran 2,5K 120 Hz est 100 € moins chère qu’à son lancement
item.description: La tablette Honor Pad X9a est une version allégée et plus abordable que l'Honor Pad 9 classique. Elle reste bien équipée et surtout son prix passe de 249,90 euros à 149,90 euros sur Amazon.

item.title: Is this the next Minidisc? Exciting Mini SSD format could suffer fate of Sony's data format if it doesn't get further backing
item.description: Biwin’s Mini SSD enters retail with higher capacities but could stay niche without broader industry backing.

item.title: Six Months Later, the Switch 2 Proves It Has Staying Power
item.description: There's no other handheld offering what the Nintendo Switch 2 does at its price.

item.title: The future of minivans? Citroen's six-seater concept EV has inflatable beds and some very clever ideas
item.description: Citroen's latest ELO concept is a "tiny house on wheels" according to its makers, but this diminutive six-seater completely changes the approach to minivans.

item.title: Samsung Galaxy XR Review: Needs More Polish
item.description: A little more accessible than the Apple Vision Pro, this Android XR headset could use more polish.

item.title: PlayStation Portal's Latest Update Proves Sony Needs a Real Handheld Console Again
item.description: Cloud gaming remains a pie-in-the-sky idea.

item.title: Galaxy S26 et One UI 8.5, Windows 11 mieux sécurisé et grosse mise à jour des Pixel… ce qu’il ne fallait pas rater – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Les actualités tech n’ont pas relâché la cadence cette semaine : de Microsoft qui facilite l’activation d’une fonctionnalité de sécurité, à de nouvelles fuites sur les futurs Samsung Galaxy S26, en passant par une mise à jour surprise qui redonne un coup de jeune aux smartphones Pixel. Si vous avez manqué quelque chose, voici notre sélection des articles les plus lus de la semaine sur Frandroid. ...

item.title: This Star Is Being Eaten Alive—and Its Explosive Death Will Be Visible in Broad Daylight
item.description: Researchers have figured out why V Sagittae is so gosh dang bright.

item.title: How Do Astronomers Find Planets in Other Solar Systems?
item.description: Even the best telescopes can’t see exoplanets. It’s all about watching for jiggly stars, blue shifts, and transits.

item.title: Confused about AMD's FSR Redstone update? You're not alone – here's what it all means for PC gamers
item.description: Confused about FSR Redstone? I don't blame you – here's the lowdown on all AMD's new game boosting features.

item.title: NYT Connections Sports Edition today: Hints and answers for December 14, 2025
item.description: Connections: Sports Edition is a New York Times word game about finding common sports threads between words. How to solve the day's puzzle.

item.title: NYT Mini crossword answers, hints for December 14, 2025
item.description: Answers to each clue for the December 14, 2025 edition of NYT's The Mini crossword puzzle.
